mention.text: KIEV -LRB- Reuters -RRB- - Ukraine 's interim leaders on Wednesday
a plan to allow the regions a greater say over their affairs

the regions which the Kiev authorities hope will address disaffection in eastern Ukraine and help undercut the influence of rebels seeking to break altogether with Kiev and join the Russian Federation
a pro-Russian rebellion in the industrialized Donbass region of eastern Ukraine , which has triggered fears of a break-up of the former Soviet republic
the deadliest attack on security forces
Russia , with acting president Oleksander Turchinov accusing Moscow of launching systematic action to destabilize eastern and southern regions of Ukraine to produce an explosive situation
their regions to become part of Russia although this call has not been taken up by Moscow
rebel leaders in Donetsk and Luhansk
the immediate pullout of all the troops of the Ukrainian army from the territories of the Donetsk , Kharkov and Lugansk regions
Our first condition for talks with the Kiev junta
